alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 7:15AM CST until January 30 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Copiah and Simpson Counties. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Monticello. * WHEN...Until Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Water appears in low areas in the extreme eastern portion of the city of Monticello. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 23.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 24.5 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Pearl River Monticello 22.0 23.6 Fri 6 am CST 24.3 24.5 23.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 715 PM CST.
